Package http.util.interceptor

Class InterceptableServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • http.util.interceptor.InterceptableServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddBanServlet, AdminServlet, DeleteBanServlet, DeleteCommentServlet, DeletePostServlet, DeleteSectionServlet, DeleteUserServlet, EditCommentServlet, EditPostServlet, EditSectionServlet, EditUserServlet, FollowServlet, HomeServlet, ImageServlet, LoadPostsServlet, LoginServlet, Logout, NewCommentServlet, NewPostServlet, NewSectionServlet, PostServlet, RegisterServlet, SearchServlet, SectionServlet, ShowBansServlet, ShowSectionServlet, ShowUsersServlet, ToggleAdminServlet, UnfollowServlet, UnvoteServlet, UserServlet, VoteServlet
    public abstract class InterceptableServlet
extends HttpServlet
    Estende la classe astratta HttpServlet per fornire supporto al meccanismo degli interceptor. È possibile applicare gli interceptor in due modi:
    • Applicando l'annotazione associata all'interceptor desiderato sul metodo "doX" desiderato
    • Applicando l'annotazione associata all'interceptor desiderato sulla classe interceptor. In questo modo, l'interceptor sarà applicato a tutti i metodi "doX" sovrascritti.
      
     @RequireAuthentication
     @EnableLogging(SEVERE)
     private static class SampleInterceptableServlet extends InterceptableServlet{
         @Override
         @ErrorsAsJson
         protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
              ....
         }
     }
    See Also:
    ServletInterceptor, HttpServlet, Serialized Form
